episodes.description:

episodes.title: Opus Dei: A Cult Exposed - Conspiracy Pilled Archive (S5 - Ep15)
episodes.description:
If you’re familiar with The DaVinci Code, you may remember the assassin who hails from a Catholic sect called Opus Dei. But you may not know that the cult is very real, and that it’s worse than Dan Brown’s portrayal. Join us tonight as Liz takes us through the history of the cult, from its human rights violations to the power it has wielded in the Vatican.
